entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
